oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of woman modeling an Easter hat decorated with Easter bunny and Easter egg, 1956
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black-and-white photograph three-quarters view of an unidentified woman, smiling, who is touching and admiring her Easter hat in a mirror. Her hat is adorned with a white Easter rabbit and an Easter egg in front. The woman is dressed in a dark shawl with plaid skirt or pants. Photograph taken at Castner Knott Department Store during the Easter season of 1956 by photographer Paul Schleicher of the Nashville Banner newspaper. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women; Popular culture; Women’s Hats; Women’s clothing--United States; Easter Bunny--Caricatures and cartoons; Easter--Social life and customs; Easter--Humor; Women--Tennessee--Nashville; Women--Social life and customs; Holidays--1950-1960
Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schleicher, Paul (Photographer)
